article_node.title: Hotel Workersâ€™ Union Fights "Resort Fee Ripoff," Launches Website to Help Guests Avoid Unfair Fees at Curator Collection hotels
article_node.summary: UNITE HERE, the union representing hotel workers, has launched a website, CuratorCollectionCon.org, to expose the hidden resort fees charged by hotels in the Curator Hotel & Resort Collection, which includes around 75 boutique hotels. The site warns travelers that these fees, averaging $40 per night and sometimes exceeding $100, are often for unwanted services. Despite promises of cost savings and fewer standards for hotel owners, membership in the Curator Collection has dropped by 37% since its 2020 launch.
